imdb.title: Brave Witches
imdb.plot: The war on pants continues! Follow the newest group of witches with the 502nd Joint Fighter Wing, the Brave Witches.

episodes.title: The Witch of Sasebo?
episodes.plot: Hikari is a hard worker, but she lacks her famous sister's magical abilities. When she gets the chance to go to Europe and fight alongside her, she gladly volunteers, but first, she'll have to prove herself by competing with another student at her school.

episodes.title: Take Flight, Chidori
episodes.plot: Hikari and her sister are off for Europe. But their plans are interrupted when the Fusou naval fleet is struck by a newly emerged Neuroi nest. It's up to Takami to defend the fleet against this unexpected threat.

episodes.title: The 502nd Joint Fighter Wing
episodes.plot: Hikari is now a full member of the 502nd, but she's not exactly welcome yet. Compared to the rest of the members, she's woefully underpowered, and the trainer isn't sure she should be allowed to fight with them at all.

episodes.title: If You Want to Fight, Get Stronger!
episodes.plot: The battle against the Neuroi is a difficult one, and the 502nd is worried that Hikari doesn't have what it takes. She's issued a challenge: if she wants to remain in the unit, she must use her magic to climb up a tall tower and grab a hat off the top.

episodes.title: Deadly Battle in the Freezing Cold
episodes.plot: Shimohara, Georgette and Hikari are out on patrol when they find the lake near the base has frozen over! It's an ice Neuroi! They engage the enemy, but it's too cold, and freezes their units solid.

episodes.title: Good Luck
episodes.plot: The base is under attack by an artillery Neuroi! It's striking from a long distance away, and it's being guided by a marker Neuroi inside the town. Sasha leads the team to take out the marker Neuroi inside Petersburg.

episodes.title: On a Holy Night
episodes.plot: It's time for the Saturnus festival, and there's no food to celebrate with! Nipa and Kanno decide to put on a Christmas celebration anyway, using local mushrooms and hand-carved presents, but their plans are interrupted by a surprise Neuroi attack.

episodes.title: Grape Juice for Your Eyes
episodes.plot: The Witches are preparing for a large-scale attack on the Neuroi nest, and to do that they'll need a new weapon. This new weapon is being transported via a supposedly safe route and Krupinski is given the task of defending the convoy.

episodes.title: Break Witches
episodes.plot: A new Neuroi has appeared and is threatening the supply lines that the 502nd worked so hard to establish. With the upcoming strike on the Neuroi nest, this threat cannot be allowed to stand.

episodes.title: Big Sister and Little Sister
episodes.plot: Takami has returned, and is going to lead the operation against the new Neuroi nest. But in exchange for fighting in her condition, she requests that Hikari be sent away to safety. Can Hikari convince her sister that she deserves to stay?

episodes.title: We Won't Know Until We Try
episodes.plot: Operation Freyja begins, but Hikari isn't a part of it. She's been shuffled off to the rear lines, while Takami stands at the forefront of the 502nd's flight wing. But when Freyja goes wrong, who will be there to help pick up the pieces and save the day?

episodes.title: Shining with Light...
episodes.plot: The twin rail guns have been destroyed and the Neuroi nest continues its advance towards Petersburg. With Takami having exhausted her power, there's only one shot left: for Hikari and Kanno to take the AP shell directly into the core itself.
